```
package main

i := 10

func main() {
    fmt.Println(i)
} 
```

```
syntax error: non-declaration statement outside function body 
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    var i = 1

    i, err := 2, true

    fmt.Println(i, err)
} 
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

var i = 1

func main() {

    i, err := 2, true

    fmt.Println(i, err)
} 
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

var i int

func main() {

    var err bool

    i, err = 2, true

    fmt.Println(i, err)
} 
```
